title: Projects
text:
Description: Leveraged data analytics to optimize cricket training sessions.
Tools Used: Python, Pandas, Matplotlib
Highlights:

Analyzed player performance metrics.
Developed visual dashboards for performance tracking.
Implemented predictive models to forecast improvement trends.






Description: Streamlined order and weight tracking for a concrete business.
Tools Used: Excel, Python, Google Sheets API
Highlights:

Automated weight logging system.
Backend logic for cost tracking and delivery scheduling.
Reduced manual workload by 60%.






Description: Built REST APIs to enhance backend development skills.
Tools Used: C++, Postman, Flask
Highlights:

Developed server-client architecture.
Practiced user data handling and security basics.

title: About Me
text:
Hi, I’m Laeeq! I’m a 20-year-old aspiring developer and cricket enthusiast.
This is my personal website where I showcase my projects, skills, and interests.




📍 Currently studying Business studies with a specialism in Data Analytics in Dublin City Univeristy
💻 Exploring Backend Development, C++, and Quarto
🎯 Passionate about cricket
🚀 Learning GitHub Pages & Web Development






🔹 Cricket Training & Performance Analysis
🔹 Concrete weight business
🔹 Quarto Website Customization





Want to connect? Reach out via: - 📧 Email: Laeeq.urrehman2@mail.dcu.ie - 🐦 Instagram: @Laeeq3x - 💼 LinkedIn: Laeeq Ur Rehman

title: Laeeq Ur Rehman
text:
👨‍💻 Welcome to My Portfolio
I’m Laeeq Ur Rehman, a final-year student at Dublin City University, specializing in Business Studies & Data Analytics.
I am passionate about: - Backend Development (C++, Python, REST APIs) - Data Analytics & Visualization (Python, R, SQL) - Entrepreneurship - Cricket
